mapper.select: select * from(select count(servicename) as memberCount, servicename from PREMIER_MEM where enddate >= now() group by servicename) a order by servicename
select count(*) from PREMIER_MEM where startdate + interval 3 day >= now()
select count(*) from payment where refund = 1 and requestdate + interval 1 day >= now()

SELECT p.SEQ, cmember.NAME, p.USERSEQ, p.SERVICENAME, p.STARTDATE, p.ENDDATE, p.SERVICESEQ, p.RESTTICKET from PREMIER_MEM AS p INNER JOIN C_MEMBER AS cmember ON p.USERSEQ = cmember.SEQ ORDER BY p.STARTDATE ASC, p.ENDDATE DESC
INSERT INTO PREMIER_SERVICE ( SERVICENAME, PRICE, DEL, CONTENT, PERIOD, SERVICEINFO ) VALUES ( #{serviceName}, #{price}, 0, #{content}, #{period}, #{serviceInfo} )
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PAYMENT ( BUYERID, SERVICENAME, PAYDATE, TOTALPAY, PAYMENTID, IMPUID, ENDDATE ) VALUES ( #{buyerId}, #{serviceName}, NOW(), #{totalPay}, #{paymentId}, #{impUid}, DATE_ADD(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d'), INTERVAL 1 MONTH) )
INSERT INTO PREMIER_MEM ( USERSEQ, SERVICESEQ, SERVICENAME, STARTDATE, ENDDATE, RESTTICKET ) VALUES ( ${userSeq}, ${serviceSeq}, #{serviceName}, NOW(), NOW() + INTERVAL 1 MONTH, #{restTicket} )
mapper.select: SELECT BUYERID, SERVICENAME, PAYDATE, TOTALPAY, PAYMENTID, IMPUID, ENDDATE FROM PAYMENT WHERE BUYERID=#{buyerId} ORDER BY PAYDATE
SELECT SERVICENAME, PAYDATE, TOTALPAY, ENDDATE FROM PAYMENT WHERE BUYERID=#{buyerId} AND NOW() < ENDDATE ORDER BY SEQ DESC LIMIT 1
select * from Payment where enddate >= now() and buyerid = ${seq} order by enddate desc limit 1
